patterns: Hi

patterns: Who created you?
Who is your developer?
Who made you?
responses: I was created by Ghana Sai.

patterns: What is your name?
What should I call you?
Who are you?
responses: You can call me SIT. I'm a SIT Chatbot.

patterns: How can I contact the college?
What is the college telephone number?
Can I get your contact number?
responses: You can contact the college at +918374983818,+919032548008.

patterns: What courses are offered in the college?
Can you tell me about the available courses?
What are the branches in the college?
responses: The college offers courses in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIML), Computer Science and Engineering(CSE), Computer Science and Technology(CST) and Computer Engineering(CE).

patterns: How much is the college fee?
Tell me about the fees
What are the hostel fees?
responses: For detailed fee information, please visit our college website : https://sithyd.siu.edu.in/pdfs/SIT-Hyderabad-UG-Fee-Approval-Letter-AY-2024-25.pdf

patterns: Where is the college located?
What is the college address?
How can I reach the college?
responses: The college is located at [Survey Number 292, Off Bangalore Highway, Modallaguda (V), Nandigama (M), Rangareddy Dist, Hyderabad, Telangana, India, Pin Code : 509217]. You can find the location on Google Maps.

patterns: Does the college provide hostel facilities?
Where is the hostel located?
What are the hostel fees?
responses: For detailed information about the hostel, please visit our college website : https://sithyd.siu.edu.in/hostel

patterns: What is the admission process?

responses: For detailed admission information, please visit our college website : https://sithyd.siu.edu.in/programme-overview

patterns: What facilities are available in the college?
Tell me about the college facilities.
Do you have a sports complex?
Do you have a Cafeteria or mess?
responses: The college provides various facilities including a sports complex, labs, cafeteria, and a library. For sports:https://sithyd.siu.edu.in/sports and For Cafeteria:https://sithyd.siu.edu.in/mess
